item.title: Lua Turns 3 years old
item.description: Yesterday Lua turned 3 years old. She helped me get through my dark days. She still does. And her ability to navigate people (already!

item.title: DNA folding forces - bioinformatics journal club presentation
item.description: Notes from a journal club presentation I gave to the Mathematics, Chemistry and Molecular Biology faculty in 2007. This was an elegant study, called on the effect of Force on Mononucleosomal Dynamics.
